Figment Silk Plunge Wrap Dress Value Pack

This pack includes the following:

 • Silk Plunge Wrap Dress - Sapphire
 • Silk Plunge Wrap Dress - Garnet
 • Silk Plunge Wrap Dress - White
 • Silk Plunge Wrap Dress - Persian Pink
 • Silk Plunge Wrap Dress - Silver
 Figment has the perfect pieces for a sophisticated date night, whether it's a night out at the theatre or dinner on the deck of a yacht. [#Legal]
